have used cells from amniotic fluid to create
small organs. This method is
expected to help doctors  monitor and

second fetus They created small organoids
from kidney lung and intestinal cells
collected from amniotic fluid samples from 12
pregnant women during
prenatal testing  This is the first time that
organoids have been grown from cells
collected during pregnancy
and from fetuses more than 22 weeks postpartum.
